channel.title: lullaby on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in lullaby on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: LOG 1.20: Chickens and Seals
item.description: 13th June, 2011 Hello everyone, It’s been half a year since I left home the second time and luckily I will be back home for some time without as much gap as last time.

item.title: Kanne Kalaimaane Lyrics and Translation
item.description: In this song, Kamal’s character is singing to Sridevi’s character. The story of Moondraam Pirai is about a troubled young man who finds a mentally ill girl about to be sold for the first time in a brothal.

item.title: Malarnthum Malaraatha Lyrics and Translation
item.description: This song is a classic. It is from a movie called Paasa Malar (flower or affection). I grew up listening to lots of oldies and enjoyed their high lyricism.
